pageProduct.name: Telfast 60mg 20 Tablets - Antihistamine for Hayfever Allergy Relief
pageProduct.description:
Â 

Information

Telfast 60mg is an effective treatment providing hayfever allergy relief within one hour and lasts for up to 12 hours.

It contains an antihistamine called fexofenadine hydrochloride which helps reduce common allergy symptoms such as runny nose, sneezing, itchy eyes and itchy throat. The non-drowsy formula means your day can go on uninterrupted.

Consider using Telfast 60mg with Telnasal Allergy Spray. Telnasal may be used to help prevent the onset of hayfever symptoms for up to 6 months in adults and children aged 12 years +.

Seasonal allergic rhinitis and perennial allergic rhinitis

Seasonal allergic rhinitis, or hayfever, is caused by an allergy to pollen from grasses, flowers, or trees. It causes sudden, frequent attacks of sneezing, nasal discharge and congestion. These episodes may also be accompanied by eye symptoms, such as stinging, watering eyes and itchy eyes. While it typically develops in childhood, it is not unusual to develop hayfever as an adult. The average age to develop seasonal allergic rhinitis is 15 years.5

Perennial allergies may occur at any time of year-unrelated to the season-or may last year-round. Perennial allergies are often a reaction to house dust. House dust may contain mold and fungal spores, fibers of fabric, animal dander, dust mite droppings, and bits of insects. These substances are present in houses year-round but may cause more severe symptoms during the cold months when more time is spent indoors. Substances that trigger an allergic reaction are called allergens.6

Multi-benefit relief

Fast acting:

Telfast 60mg tablets provide hayfever allergy relief within 1 hour, and last for up to 12 hours.

Non-drowsy:

Relieves symptoms of hayfever without leaving you drowsy, so you can get on with your day.

Australia's #1 hayfever brand:

Telfast is Australia's #1 selling allergy brand*. It provides fast**, non-drowsy relief for hayfever allergy symptoms.

*IQVIA Allergy Market Units MAT 08/08/2020

**Fast indicates product works in 1 hour

Fast effective relief from

  • 5. Australian Institute of Health and Welfare 2011. Allergic rhinitis (hayfever) in Australia. Cat. no. ACM 23. Canberra: AIHW.
  • 6. MSD Manuals Year-Round Allergies 2019.
